name: Release v3.0(171)
body:
# Features
  -  Support, with user explicit consent, the automatic upload of newly installed app versions.
     - Backup Apps app was deprecated and we need to port over important features to the Uploader.
  - Uploading all aab files instead of only splits with “config” on its name.
 # Bugfixes & improvements
 - Implemented database migration.
 - Fixed null user avatar in case the user was already logged in from the previous version.
 - Fixed installed apps list load.
 - Fixed removing the last app from auto upload selection list.
 - Fixed bug where the user could click on the checkbox and it would select the checkbox instead of the row on the auto upload selection list view.
 - Fixed bug where you would have to double click the “submit” button in order to confirm the app selection.
 - Fixed crash after device rotation.
 # Issue references in JIRA
  ## [Uploader]
 - APP-84: Auto-Upload Apps - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/APP-84
 - APP-744: Update while logged in - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/APP-744
 - APP-751: Remove last app from Auto Upload - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/APP-751
 - APP-752: Change device perspective causes a crash - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/APP-752
 - APP-761: Upload all aab files - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/APP-761

name: Release v2.210(167)
body:
# Features
- New flow for the Auto-Login (Login with Aptoide current session)
  - The goal here was to give the user more control over the Login when he has Aptoide installed on the same device with a current valid session.

# Issue references in JIRA
## [Quality]
- MOB-788: [Auto-Login Uploader] Should Happen on any uploader startup - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-788
- MOB-808: Autologin button layout change - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-808
- MOB-862: Store Creation breaks login flow - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-862
- MOB-1002: Support store creation in landscape - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-1002
- MOB-1004: Auto-Login from no internet available state message missing - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-1004
- MOB-1040: Remove private store switch in Uploader (there is a bug in API side that is creating unstable private stores) - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-1040

name: Release v2.200(162)
body:
# Features
- A complete revamp of the native login system, enabling the users to Login to their Aptoide accounts without the need of a password.
  - Our goal is to eliminate the need to store sensitive user data but still allow users to login in Aptoide, we do not store any passwords in Aptoide servers.

# Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Minor fixes and improvements

# Issue references in JIRA
## [Login]
- MOB-560: Passwordless Login (Magic Link) - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-560

## [Quality]
- MOB-672: Facebook Login Fail - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-672
- MOB-636: Scroll Text View not working (App Form) - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-636
- MOB-772: hotfix: Create Store not working (wrong base host) - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-772
- MOB-771: Remove Maintenance view - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-771

name: Release 2.104(150)
body:
## Bug Fixes & Improvements

- Fixed a bug in the metadata form that was not showing all Aptoide supported categories.
- Drop metadata/exists call and replace it by handling missing arguments status in the status/get response
- Add new superproperty version_code to rakam

name: Release 2.103(148)
body:
# Features
- Apps in store (clouds) information is now persisted in the user device, optimizing both data & battery utilization
  - md5's would be calculated every time for all apps on app launch and requests to Aptoide backend would be done in order to validate if apps are already uploaded or not. Now we persist information and only calculate changes.
- Optimized the number of notification updates to the OS
  - To reduce the issue of having notifications stuck on the notification tray on a specific state (usually indeterminate progress), we reduced the number of requests we do to the system to minimize the probability of this issue happening without compromising information display to the user. (this does not prevent the issue from happening, since it depends on the OS rules for updating notifications)

# Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Clicking store name will take the user to Aptoide - Store View
- Long-pressing an App will prompt to uninstall that app. Pull to Refresh will sync installed apps.
- Pull to refresh now syncs new installed apps with server (checks if they are or not in store)
- If upload results in App already in store, update the view with the cloud icon, if for any reason it isn't yet.
- Fixed issue when user pull-to-refreshed apps grid with Sort: "By Name" on.
- Fixed error that would sometimes happen while a uploading an app, server validation would fail because of mismatched information (version code we send versus version code of the apk file)
- Fixed issue of trying to upload the same app twice, would restart the process, now it doesn't.
- Aptoide Login Issue.
- Problem regarding uploading several splits at the same time
- Errors while uploading files are now going to Rakam
- Notifications: Minimized the chance for the App Successfully Uploaded notification to fail to be shown, causing the pending notification (indeterminate) to stay stuck forever until dismissed.
- New times to get Status.
  - Base 2, 5 tries. every 20s, 4 tries.

# Issue references in JIRA
## [V-Uploader]
- MOB-236: Aptoide Login Issue -  https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-236
- MOB-213: Optimize notification hits - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-213
- MOB-212: Save already uploaded apps information - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-212
- MOB-215: Implement charles certificate for release requests debug - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-215
- MOB-214: Upload of Same APP Repeated, submits error - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-214
- MOB-216: Cloud Icon Missing in Duplicate App in Store flow - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-216
- MOB-217: [APK-6] APK package and vercode mismatch - https://aptoide.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-217
- UP-91: Upload of two apps at the same time.
- UP-106: Expand notifications.
- UP-107: Add APK-107 error message and notification.

name: Release v2.7_80
body:
# New:
## Features:
* [AAO-74] - Cloud icon meaning: “is this app in my store?"
* [AAO-119] - Validating password while creating user account in order to match the vanilla rules
* [AAO-76] [AAO-83] - Category on application form is filled. Plus new ws for category list

## Major:
* proguard rules were added 
* google-play-services dependencies were decreased: basement, auth, plus

## Bug fix:
* [AAO-98] - Facebook login is working
* [AAO-72] - Create store flow is now working
* [AAO-111] - Logout crash
* [AAO-117] - Fixed google sign-in inconsistent state after canceling by the user
			
	
# Published
https://aptoide.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AQ/pages/69763073/Uploader+2.7
